RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Sanchez's parents: Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's father and Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's mother

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alfredo Ortega-Chavez: Defendant and appellant convicted of conspiracy to bring or attempt to bring undocumented aliens into the United States, implicated by Sanchez's deposition testimony
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.GARWOOD: Circuit Judge presiding over the appeal of Alfredo Ortega-Chavez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez: Gave deposition testimony that implicated the appellant in the alien smuggling operation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alejandro Gonzalez Delgado: Co-conspirator and participant in the smuggling operation with Ortega-Chavez and Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez, arrested for being an undocumented alien
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Graciela Castaneda: Witness for the appellant, testified about having brunch with the appellant on November 22, 1980, and provided alibi testimony, stated that Ortega-Chavez had been in San Antonio on the day in question, also mentioned as previous witness in later proceedings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's father: Rebuttal witness who testified that the appellant was in Sabinas Hidalgo on November 22, 1980, and previously talked to another Assistant United States Attorney in connection with procuring a lawyer for his son
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's mother: Rebuttal witness who testified that she saw the appellant in Sabinas Hidalgo on the evening of November 21, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Sanchez's parents: Rebuttal witnesses who testified against the appellant's alibi
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ms. Salinas: Defense counsel who introduced Sanchez's deposition testimony as part of the evidence, did not indicate any dissatisfaction with the judge's remarks or request any balancing ruling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mrs. Guerrero: Juror who knew defense counsel Ms. Salinas but assured the court she could remain fair and impartial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Kazen: Trial judge who instructed the jury to disregard any opinions or biases they might infer from his rulings or comments
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juan Gonzalez Torres: Witness who testified that he saw Ortega-Chavez in Sabinas Hidalgo on both November 21, 1980 and November 22, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Josefina Contreras de Gonzalez: Witness who stated that she saw the appellant in Sabinas Hidalgo on the evening of November 21, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alfredo Ortega-Chavez, Ramon Gonzalez Sa: Individuals involved in the smuggling operation of five undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez, Alejandro Gonzal: Individuals arrested at the bridge for attempting to smuggle illegal aliens into the United States
